resources.string: When you start a new Word Sudoku game you will be presented with a square grid consisting of a number of cells. For every row and column there must contain no repeating words. For every outlined sub-square, there must contain no repeating words\nHint: If you encounter any difficulty translating the words featured in your puzzle, you can tap the dictionary button to see a table with the translation of all your puzzles featured words. But remember, you can only access this translation table twice per game!
You have reached the maximum number of dictionary peeks for this puzzle. Sorry.
